speaker: CAPULET
text:
So
               
              many
               
              guests
               
              invite
               
              as
               
              here
               
              are
               
              writ
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
Sirrah
              ,
               
              go
               
              hire
               
              me
               
              twenty
               
              cunning
               
              cooks
              .

speaker: SERVINGMAN
text:
You
               
              shall
               
              have
               
              none
               
              ill
              ,
               
              sir
              ,
               
              for
               
              I’ll
               
              try
               
              if
              
              they
               
              can
               
              lick
               
              their
               
              fingers
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
How
               
              canst
               
              thou
               
              try
               
              them
               
              so
              ?

speaker: SERVINGMAN
text:
Marry
              ,
               
              sir
              ,
               
              ’tis
               
              an
               
              ill
               
              cook
               
              that
               
              cannot
               
              lick
              
              his
               
              own
               
              fingers
              .
               
              Therefore
               
              he
               
              that
               
              cannot
               
              lick
               
              his
              
              fingers
               
              goes
               
              not
               
              with
               
              me
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
Go
              ,
               
              begone
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
We
               
              shall
               
              be
               
              much
               
              unfurnished
               
              for
               
              this
               
              time
              .
              —

speaker: CAPULET
text:
What
              ,
               
              is
               
              my
               
              daughter
               
              gone
               
              to
               
              Friar
               
              Lawrence
              ?

speaker: NURSE
text:
Ay
              ,
               
              forsooth
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
Well
              ,
               
              he
               
              may
               
              chance
               
              to
               
              do
               
              some
               
              good
               
              on
               
              her
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
A
               
              peevish
               
              self-willed
               
              harlotry
               
              it
               
              is
              .

speaker: NURSE
text:
See
               
              where
               
              she
               
              comes
               
              from
               
              shrift
               
              with
               
              merry
               
              look
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
How
               
              now
              ,
               
              my
               
              headstrong
              ,
               
              where
               
              have
               
              you
               
              been
               
              gadding
              ?

speaker: JULIET
text:
Where
               
              I
               
              have
               
              learned
               
              me
               
              to
               
              repent
               
              the
               
              sin

speaker: JULIET
text:
Of
               
              disobedient
               
              opposition

speaker: JULIET
text:
To
               
              you
               
              and
               
              your
               
              behests
              ,
               
              and
               
              am
               
              enjoined

speaker: JULIET
text:
By
               
              holy
               
              Lawrence
               
              to
               
              fall
               
              prostrate
               
              here

speaker: JULIET
text:
To
               
              beg
               
              your
               
              pardon
              .
               
              Pardon
              ,
               
              I
               
              beseech
               
              you
              .

speaker: JULIET
text:
Henceforward
               
              I
               
              am
               
              ever
               
              ruled
               
              by
               
              you
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
Send
               
              for
               
              the
               
              County
              .
               
              Go
               
              tell
               
              him
               
              of
               
              this
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
I’ll
               
              have
               
              this
               
              knot
               
              knit
               
              up
               
              tomorrow
               
              morning
              .

speaker: JULIET
text:
I
               
              met
               
              the
               
              youthful
               
              lord
               
              at
               
              Lawrence’
               
              cell

speaker: JULIET
text:
And
               
              gave
               
              him
               
              what
               
              becomèd
               
              love
               
              I
               
              might
              ,

speaker: JULIET
text:
Not
               
              stepping
               
              o’er
               
              the
               
              bounds
               
              of
               
              modesty
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
Why
              ,
               
              I
               
              am
               
              glad
               
              on
               
              ’t
              .
               
              This
               
              is
               
              well
              .
               
              Stand
               
              up
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
This
               
              is
               
              as
               
              ’t
               
              should
               
              be
              .
              —
              Let
               
              me
               
              see
               
              the
               
              County
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
Ay
              ,
               
              marry
              ,
               
              go
              ,
               
              I
               
              say
              ,
               
              and
               
              fetch
               
              him
               
              hither
              .
              —

speaker: CAPULET
text:
Now
              ,
               
              afore
               
              God
              ,
               
              this
               
              reverend
               
              holy
               
              friar
              ,

speaker: CAPULET
text:
All
               
              our
               
              whole
               
              city
               
              is
               
              much
               
              bound
               
              to
               
              him
              .

speaker: JULIET
text:
Nurse
              ,
               
              will
               
              you
               
              go
               
              with
               
              me
               
              into
               
              my
               
              closet

speaker: JULIET
text:
To
               
              help
               
              me
               
              sort
               
              such
               
              needful
               
              ornaments

speaker: JULIET
text:
As
               
              you
               
              think
               
              fit
               
              to
               
              furnish
               
              me
               
              tomorrow
              ?

speaker:
LADY
               
              CAPULET
text:
No
              ,
               
              not
               
              till
               
              Thursday
              .
               
              There
               
              is
               
              time
               
              enough
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
Go
              ,
               
              nurse
              .
               
              Go
               
              with
               
              her
              .
               
              We’ll
               
              to
               
              church
               
              tomorrow
              .

speaker:
LADY
               
              CAPULET
text:
We
               
              shall
               
              be
               
              short
               
              in
               
              our
               
              provision
              .

speaker:
LADY
               
              CAPULET
text:
’Tis
               
              now
               
              near
               
              night
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
Tush
              ,
               
              I
               
              will
               
              stir
               
              about
              ,

speaker: CAPULET
text:
And
               
              all
               
              things
               
              shall
               
              be
               
              well
              ,
               
              I
               
              warrant
               
              thee
              ,
               
              wife
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
Go
               
              thou
               
              to
               
              Juliet
              .
               
              Help
               
              to
               
              deck
               
              up
               
              her
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
I’ll
               
              not
               
              to
               
              bed
               
              tonight
              .
               
              Let
               
              me
               
              alone
              .

speaker: CAPULET
text:
I’ll
               
              play
               
              the
               
              housewife
               
              for
               
              this
               
              once
              .
              —
              What
               
              ho
              !
              —

speaker: CAPULET
text:
They
               
              are
               
              all
               
              forth
              .
               
              Well
              ,
               
              I
               
              will
               
              walk
               
              myself

speaker: CAPULET
text:
To
               
              County
               
              Paris
              ,
               
              to
               
              prepare
               
              up
               
              him

speaker: CAPULET
text:
Against
               
              tomorrow
              .
               
              My
               
              heart
               
              is
               
              wondrous
               
              light

speaker: CAPULET
text:
Since
               
              this
               
              same
               
              wayward
               
              girl
               
              is
               
              so

              .
